arts.ttl: Phillips grabs first Ipswich goal in win over Bristol Rovers
arts.sum: Manchester City loanee Kalvin Phillips scores his first goal for Ipswich in a 3-0 win over League One Bristol Rovers in the FA Cup at Portman Road.

arts.ttl: Kieran McKenna says Kalvin Phillips ‘growing in confidence’ after Ipswich win
arts.sum: Manchester City loanee Phillips has featured just 11 times in the Premier League this season.

arts.ttl: Phillips grabs first Ipswich goal in win over Bristol Rovers
arts.sum: Manchester City loanee Kalvin Phillips scores his first goal for Ipswich in a 3-0 win over League One Bristol Rovers in the FA Cup at Portman Road.

arts.ttl: Kalvin Phillips on target as Ipswich cruise past Bristol Rovers
arts.sum: Town eased off after the break but missed the chance for a fourth when Ali Al-Hamadi scuffed a penalty wide of the post after a handball in the area.

arts.ttl: Watch: Phillips scores his first goal for Ipswich
arts.sum: Watch Kalvin Philips score his first goal for Ipswich Town in their FA Cup third round match against Bristol Rovers.

arts.ttl: FA Cup fourth round draw LIVE: Liverpool, Chelsea, Man City learn opponents after Arsenal vs Man Utd clash
arts.sum: The draw for the fourth round takes place, with fixtures to be played on the weekend of 8 February

arts.ttl: Transfer news and rumours today: Matic to Ipswich, Ozcan to Villa, Alleyne to Dortmund
arts.sum: Sports Mole rounds up the latest transfer news and rumours, including Nemanja Matic to Ipswich Town, Yasin Ozcan to Aston Villa and Max Alleyne to Borussia Dortmund.

arts.ttl: Cesc Fàbregas confirms Como’s approach for Ipswich target Nemanja Matić
arts.sum: Como 1907 head coach Cesc Fàbregas confirmed to DAZN that his side have been trying to secure the transfer of Nemanja Matić (36) from Olympique Lyonnais. Fàbregas told the broadcaster,…

arts.ttl: Transfer news and rumours: Donyell Malen to Aston Villa, Nemanja Matic to Ipswich
arts.sum: Sports Mole rounds up the latest transfer news and rumours, including Donyell Malen to Aston Villa, Nemanja Matic to Ipswich Town and Kevin Schade to Borussia Dortmund.
